article.title: Research Lab Awards Electro-Optical Countermeasures Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: MacAulay-Brown Incorporated, Dayton, Ohio, is being awarded a $24,125,000 indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity cost-plus-fixed-fee contract to conduct electro-optical threat warning research at the Air Force Research Laboratory, electro-optics countermeasures, in the area of missile warning, hostile fire indication, sense, avoid, and space situational awareness and intelligence collection.Â Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
